name: Blamyvog Demo
description:
DEMO

Blamyvog is a point-and-click adventure about scientists, AI, puzzles and anientisement.

Two hydrogeologists were sent on an expedition to the distant planet named Blamyvog to explore the underground waters, but due to unforeseen circumstances their rover got stuck in an acid lake, and now you need to help them get out of trouble and (preferably) complete the expedition.

Key Features:

  • Classic point-and-click adventure (if you miss picking up everything that isn't nailed down, then you've come to the right place)
  • Lots of puzzles that will make your brain boil a little bit
  • Explore an alien planet (if walking on several locations can be considered as exploration)
  • Sweet low-poly style


Controls:

  • Right click - Interact
  • Left click - Open/close inventory
  • Left click on inventory item - Examine it
  • Middle click or space bar - Highlight hotspots
  • Double click - Teleport to location or run
  • ESC - Skip cutscenes or open menu

Credits:

  • Design, story, programming by Anatoly Titov
  • Music by Kevin Colombin
